short_summary: Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services Against Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
description: Temporary help services are required for the Department of National Defense. The services will be supplied under the supply arrangement EN578-172870. Suppliers are invited to submit proposals based on the selected stream and category.
full_summary:
**Job Title:** Special Advisor (English/French)
**Supply Arrangement:** Temporary Help Services (NCR)
**Reference Number:** cb-954-64241126

The Department of National Defense has issued a Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services through the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the streams and categories listed below.

**Job Category:** Special Advisor
**Business Area:** Temporary Help Services

**Important Details:**

*   Request for Proposal (RFP): The Department of National Defense is seeking bids for one (1) Special Advisor to provide temporary help services.
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tenders
*   Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Invited Contractors:**
9149481 Canada Inc.
Adirondack Information Management Inc.
AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
DBHS Security Consulting Inc
Elevated Thinking Inc.
Etico, Inc.
GovInsights Consulting Inc.
H2 ANALYTICS INC.
Mindwire Systems Ltd.
Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
Solutions Moerae Inc
Lansdowne Consulting Group Inc.
The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated
V42 Management Consulting, Inc.

**Security Clearance:**
The position requires a minimum Secret security clearance. Interested candidates must have an active security clearance or be able to obtain one.

**Bid Submission:**
Bids must be submitted electronically, with the attachment containing instructions provided. The bid submission deadline is 1:00 PM (ETS) on October 4, 2023.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries or more information, please contact CFSG(O-G) at CFSGO-G-TemporaryHelp-GSFCO-G@forces.gc.ca or by phone at (613) 971-7955.

*   Job Title: Special Advisor
*   Position Type: Temporary Help Services
*   Business Area: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Industries: Temporary personnel services ( UNSPC 80111600)
